modName: MickkPewPew's Server Side Santa and Friends
modShortDescription: This mod contains 5 custom zombies: Santa, BernardtheElf, HollytheElf, BuddytheElf and BobbytheElf. These will all spawn in the Snow Biome.
modDescription:
This mod contains 5 custom [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/): Santa, BernardtheElf, HollytheElf, BuddytheElf and BobbytheElf.

These will all spawn in the Snow Biome and are all harvestable after you kill them, they reward;

Up to x500 of each round at a 50% chance, they also give Dukes, Santa up to 15k, Elfs up to 10k.

To spawn these in yourself search Santa and Elf.

Happy Christmas!

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/7x1mpvzyc5wngc3/MickkpewpewChristmasMod.zip?dl=1)**

If you appreciate Mickkpewpewâ€™s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](http://paypal.me/Mickkpewpew).
